column1: West Ways was near The Lawn and probably number 8 West Terrace, but one of the houses set well back off the street or the church is too close
Records are taken between 8.15 and 8.30 am
Note says “1939 Jan, June and total altered for arithmetic : 1948” but no indication of what the original figures were, or why the months and total were adjusted
1941 Apr, June, Oct, Nov small estimations
